name: Exclusive English Course
description: This Exclusive English course is entirely designed to develop one's English skill in every way. Whether its grammar's purpose or writing or speaking. Everything is covered exclusively that will help every learner's to learn effectively . The purpose of this course is to make the learner an effective speaker, creative writer and also a master in grammar..
feature: I have prepared the curriculum in such a way that this exclusive course will be parted in three major segments and all the segments will be covered in an effective way. I sincerely hope, this is going to be an enjoyable journey for all of us. Good luck!

name: Grammar Boss
description: Grammar Boss We all want to speak English more or less. That's why we get admission in various coaching centers. The funny thing is that we insist on accent before we learn the rules or structure of English. Which should not be done at all. The paper is such that I need a car we call I'm a car means trying to keep the accent correct by making grammar mistakes inside! But I hope you don't want to be laughed at by doing this. So in my new course I will teach you how to become the Boss of grammar in the easiest and fastest way. Which is the most important thing to learn English and thus speaking English should not be a laughing stock. So definitely don't waste the time of this lockdown and buy the Grammar Boss course today and overcome your weakness at home.
feature: Grammar A to Z 1.Tense (Basic to Advance) 2.Preposition with definition 3.Article 4.Common grammatical mistakes 5.Exams

name: Academic IELTS - Basic to Advanced
description: ELTS Academic Test is a must for any student who is looking forward to pursuing higher education abroad. Most international universities prefer a band score of 6.5 and above. In this course, I have shared secret formula to excel at your IELTS Writing Task 1 & 2. This includes step by step tutorial on how to avoid getting a band score of 6 or less. IELTS Reading, Speaking & Listening modules have been organized in such a way that you will not miss any of the question types in your exam.
feature: *Writing Task 1 and Writing Task 2 Formula with all essay and task types explained *All types of Reading passages explained with live practice *Listening question types with tips *Analysis of Speaking parts with special hacks *Advanced grammar rules for scoring band 7 or higher in Writing
